de.ostfalia.snakecore.SnakeServer.controller

Class StompServiceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ostfalia.snakecore.SnakeServer.controller.StompServiceController

  • @Controller
public class StompServiceController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Benjamin Wulfert The StompServiceController handles all communication between connected clients and this backend via WebSockets / STOMP-Protocoll.
